ProductInfo.Features:
DVR Features: Plug-n-Play, Record: 240 fps, Display: 240 fps, Embedded Linux OS, IR Remote Control, PTZ via RS-485 Port, Signal System: NTSC /PAL, H.264 Hardware Compression, 1TB HD Installed and Configured
Video Input /Output: BNC 8/BNC 1, Video Output: VGA, Audio Input /Output: RCA 4/BNC 1, Recording Mode: Continuous/Scheduled/Motion, Display Mode: Each/All/Auto Switch/Hidden, Playback Search: Time & Date, Event List
Network:RJ45 TCP/IP or DDNS, Remote Access: LAN or IE Browser, Supports Remote View via Smart Phone & 3G Mobile with each of these systems below: iPhoneTM; Google AndroidTM; BlackberryTM OS V4.6; Windows MobileTM Pro 5.0 & 6.1; SymbianTM S60 3rd & S60 5th
Camera Features: 1/4" Color CMOS Image Sensor, 480 TV Lines, Horizontal, 6mm Lens, Signal: NTSC, Night Vision Min. Light: 0 Lux (IR On), IR Irradiation Distance: up to 30', Operation Temperature: -25F~122F, Weatherproof: Yes, Power: 12V DC, Mount: Ceiling or Wall, Video Connector: BNC, Power Connector: RCA 12V DC, Color: Black
Package Includes: 1x DVR-H9118V-1TB DVR, 8x CM-C21606BK Outdoor Security Cameras with Brackets, 8x 60ft Video + Power All-in-one Cable for Security Cameras, 2x 12V/1.5A 4 Port Power Supply for Security Cameras, 1x IR Remote Control & Mouse, User's Manual
ProductInfo.Name: ZMODO ZMD-KDS8-SARAZ8ZN-1TB 8 CH CCTV Security DVR Outdoor IR Camera System with 1TB Hard Drive
